content.detailedDescription: I woke up shortly after 2:15 a.M.  my bedroom window faces south/southwest.  through the horizontal blinds i could see many stars (the sky was very clear).  one star in particular was brighter then the others.  i noticed this "star" began to move. (i used the horizontal blinds as a means to measure the movement of this "star").  this star or object moved unlike any airplane or helicopter.  in an up-down, zig-zag motion this object moved in a southwestardly direction.  it was at this time i got up from my bed and moved closer to my window.  i moved the horizontal blinds as to not obstruct my vision.  the object was actually pulsating and would appear larger and brighter at times, and actually went from a whitish color to a more amber color when it was at its largest.  the object continued to move in a southwestardly direction all the while it "pulsed".  the pulses seemed rythmic, and continued, as it moved for about 3 minutes.  i had to look away from time to time over the three minutes, as to make sure the object was actually moving in this unusual manner.  i used other stationary stars as a means to determine the movement of this object.  it is important to note that at end of this sighting i had a feeling that "it" was aware, that i was aware of its presence.  it was unlike any experience i have ever had.  i was not scared, but more like a feeling of not being alone.  i felt like it knew i was watching it.  this whole experience lasted about 3 minutes.  the object simply pulsated and then disappeared.  no one was with me when i saw this object.  my dogs were on my bed with me but seemed unaffected by it.  once the object disappeared, i immediately got online and looked up ufo sightings in utah, more specifically moab.  after about 1 1/2 hours of research online i went back to bed around 4a.M.  it was when i woke up again around 7am i decided i would try to contact elaine douglas of mufon. it is important to note that my home phone (land line) was working without incident, however beginning this morning there is alot of static with little to no volume.  i will be calling fronteir communications to rectify the problem, but could the object i saw last night disrupted my phone service?  i live in a rural community, so i do not want to start asking neighbors if they saw this object last night.  i certainly saw something unlike any other in the sky last night.  i hope this detailed account helps anyone interested.  i will make sure to look in the sky tonight in the same direction to see if it returns.
content.summary: The object was an orb shape that seemed to pulsate rythmically

content.detailedDescription: I took a photograph up in renfrew county over christmas. i can't explain the shining orb. i didn't notice it at the time. this lake is not in any flight paths and the county is rather remote and quiet.
content.summary: I only noticed it in the photograph

content.detailedDescription:
This is a photograph i received from a relative which i had digitally scanned at a local printshop. my relative said that the dark object in the sky (top-right of lighthouse) was not apparent at the time this photograph was taken. however the anomaly was clearly apparent upon review/development of the photograph - as you can see. said relative did not report any unusual happenings or unusual emotions while at the lighthouse.

as i have seen the original photograph, i can safely say that upon close inspection, the blurry black disc distinctly "appears" to be behind the lighthouse in perspective (vs. in between the camera and the lighthouse). the disc left a faint trail (blur) to its left, as though it was moving from left to right when the photo was taken. again, this trail appears to extend behind the tower, and not in front of it.

i don't believe it is significant, but the man facing to the camera has strange eyes and hands.
content.summary: Photographic anomaly or hovering disc? ***repost***

content.detailedDescription: I was driving through the desert outside albuquerque on the east side of the sandia mountains towards madrid and santa fe.  i was looking out the driver side window at the beautiful mountains.  i saw a commercial airline jet slowing down and heading into the city.  about 1000 ft behind the jet was a ufo trailing the jet at the same speed.  it was very clear. the jet was white.  the egg-shaped object behind it was round, shiny, and reflecting the sun like a mirror.  i was directly below it looking up at it.  i stopped the car and got out to take a better look.  i stood and stared at it for another minute.  i rubbed my eyes and pinched myself not believing what i was seeing.  i was totally straight and sober.  after that the jet and the spacecraft went over the mountain, so i could not see them anymore.  i was standing there in the middle of the desert with nobody else around for miles.  i stood there a little while hoping i would see it again or see another one.  i was a skeptic until that day.  now i know it is real.  my friends have seen them.  my mother, my grandma, my neighbor, and my aunt have seen them too.  most people are afraid to speak out for fear of ridicule.
content.summary: Shiny, chrome-colored at distance of 8000 ft

content.detailedDescription:
This is a photograph i received from a relative which i had digitally scanned at a local printshop.  my relative said that the dark object in the sky (top-right of lighthouse) was not apparent at the time this photograph was taken.  however the anomaly was clearly apparent upon review/development of the photograph - as you can see.  said relative did not report any unusual happenings or unusual emotions while at the lighthouse.

as i have seen the original photograph, i can safely say that upon close inspection, the blurry black disc distinctly "appears" to be behind the lighthouse in perspective (vs. in between the camera and the lighthouse).  the disc left a faint trail (blur) to its left, as though it was moving from left to right when the photo was taken.  again, this trail appears to extend behind the tower, and not in front of it.

i don't believe it is significant, but the man facing to the camera has strange eyes and hands.
content.summary: Photographic anomaly or hovering disc?

content.detailedDescription:
Please see attached pictures.
 and there is many more.
content.summary: Pictures

content.detailedDescription:

 and there is many more.
content.summary: Pictures

content.detailedDescription: I was about to walk the dog around 6am, and looked out the front door. i looked into the western sky, when i saw something that looked like the shuttle exploding, or the video footage of it. only this was traveling slow, and was in a straight line acroos the mountains. i remember seeing blue and green for the colors. the must have been about 40 or so lights swirling around this object as it traveled. i can say i have seen nothing of this nature before in the sky. i heard later that it was some kind of russian space debris?? since when does debris travel along the sky and not loose altitude? anyways i thought i would share that with you. i am suprised the news in denver didn't report anything on it.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object rotating burning lights, traveling south along front range

content.detailedDescription:
Dear sirs

it came from northeast and i noticed it because it shined so brightly and it was fast, much faster than aeroplane, light was kind of yellowish.I had never seen anything quite like that before.(the whole duration of this event was about 12 sec - i grabbed my phone instantly). then the light started to faint - object was oval shaped from my point of view (its hard to tell)its colour was maybe gray.The object was approx. 5km away. and then suddenly this object changed its way. i tought it went north but it seems it did the opposite. it happened so fast i just couldnt realize - it was gone. i was driving my car and i managed to snap 2 photos durin the event. i drove alone. i just happened to have my phone at hand when all this happened. and luckily i just did wash my car so that windshield was clean! and what made feel uncertain about all this is that in the photos there is two objects - i only saw one.

i would like to remain anonymous

sincerely,

mr. p
content.summary: Flying bright object.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were over the road truck drivers. on the way home from california we stopped at a favorite truck pulloff of ours on i-70 just east of grand junction colorado. its a box canyon, on the colorado river.I was trying to relax after a long day of trucking,standing outfront of my truck i was watching the jets flying overhead. when i noticed a dot in the sky that was dark & was moveing in a different line, than the other jets. than i yelled at my wife to come see. she climbed out of the truck & joined me in the front of the truck. the dot grew larger and larger, my wife grabbed me shouting is it coming tward us!!?? by this time we noticed there was no sound. we seen no lights. the only way we seen this thing was the moon was riseing in the east, and we were inthis box conyon with no light trash, the stars really come out with no clair. this thing huge!! it was not from this world. we watched it until it dissapered behind the rocks. we were so shook up about this that we didn`t talk about it until the next day around noon, and we compared notes & decided we seen the same thing. it moved in a straight line leaveing no jet trail, and makeing no sound....
content.summary: I was watching jets overhead , when i seen something different.

content.detailedDescription:
I took this picture saturday morning 12/6/07 from the field in front of my house at 9:10am. any questions can be directed to  http://www.Encmufon.Com/

there is the original and several workups. i was looking for objects in the sky when i saw the object. i followed it quite a way in my viewfinder before i took the picture mainly to let the auto focus work properly.
content.summary: Object crossing sky in eastern north carolina

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were returning home from christmas in ohio on dec 28 approximately 9:30 pm.We were traveling in a north direction on a rural country road.  we neared the road that we live on we both observed a blue white ball of light fall in a slight arch from  south east to north west.. it traveled much slower than a meteor. my best estimate is that we observed it for perhaps 5 sec.We live  far enough from the nearest city, being adrian mi, that we are not bothered by city lights and are often sky watching.We could not see where it may have landed. it appeared the size of my thumb nail on an out stretched arm. we both looked at each other and ask "did you see that". this is not the first time we have observed anomilies in our night sky as well as day sky but the first time we have seen a blue white ball.
content.summary: A blue white circle or ball shape  fell from east to west in a slight arch

content.detailedDescription:
A coworker and myself was behind federal mogul a factory in frankfort indiana.  we looked up noticed the stars were being blanked out no lights in a giant tringler shape moving very slowly we watched it for several minutes until it went away. i thought it was a ufo because of the stars being blanked out in just that area. and then we went back in the plant the thing was traveling from south to north.  if there have been any other reports like this around area please let me know about it.

thank you

phil wessel
content.summary: A coworker and myself  behind a factory and looked up and the stars were blanked out

content.detailedDescription: I went out on our front porch to have a smoke , looking eastward i saw jets making their routine line-ups in the sky to land at o'hare as it is just southwest of us when i saw a shape and light that seemed different from the rest so i watch it closer . it had a disc like shape and the color seemed much different from the planes . it was orange in color and was very bright it moved slowly north to south when it moved behind the house acrossed the street , i than moved to my left ( north ) a few steps and saw it again when just at that moment it shot straight up at a great speed and was gone. it was a very clear night and there was a good number of stars out for a chicago night. i came in and told my wife and i'm sure she thought i was mistaken. i told a friend of mine the story a day later he than told me the stories that came a week or so later about the o'hare sightings in early nov.It seemed very close to my own sighting earlier .
content.summary: Saw object hover north to south and than it shot up ( very fast )

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were travelling north on rt 12 through walpole nh on the way home.  i had looked at our truck's clock at 10:18pm when we were still in westmoreland nh on rt 12, so it was 2 minutes later when we entered walpole nh on rt 12 that we spotted it. there was one vehicle 1/4 or so mile behind us. whatever it's start point we did not see from the view in our truck.  it came directly into our line of sight from above, diagonally crossing our path from west to east, plummeting in a swift-looking decline towards the area, geographically to our east, which we rationalized as the area of alstead or surry nh.  my husband is very familiar with the area, having grown up here.  we lost track of it when it passed the treeline.  no flash or sound that we could sense.

it was a large bright fluorescent green orb in the center, perfectly round, with a bright red arrow head shape surrounding it.  the visual impression suggested a great speed of decline with no impression of slowing, as for a landing.

it was very clear and there was nothing else, no plane or air vehicle shape, indicating a manmade transport.  consistency of color, with no variation, which might indicate fireworks or other incendiaries.  sorry, no camera!!!

as a follow-up, we have seen an increase in military airtravel in the area of our sighting the last several nights.
content.summary: While driving a bright green orb with a bright red arrowhead shape surrounding the orb quickly descended toward alstead nh

content.detailedDescription:
My wife was in oregon last august visiting a friend. they were touring up the coast on the way to washington state. yesterday while rearranging her photos on the computer i happened to notice something in the background of a photo (attached) showing her sitting on a wall with mount st. helens in the background. being her typical self, she simply blows it off, neither of them having noticed anything at the time. she doesn't recall any details as to exact time or place except that it was somewhere along a highway.  

however, i was able to match the view and angle in the photo with google earth and i think it was taken at the elk rock lookout on spirit lake memorial highway (504). i've guesstimated the time as sometime around 1-2pm, probably closer to 1 pm.

i've tried zooming in on the object but still get no positive recognition, although there are faint highlights of possible attachments or appendages visible at relatively high zoom before it gets totally fuzzy. unfortunately, it was not a high-resolution camera.

while it is probably just an airplane caught at an unusual angle, i thought it worth bringing to your attention.

have a nice day.
content.summary: Short cigar-like object in photo background

content.detailedDescription: Was walking north on oval beach in dougals mich to do some fishing. it was clear out and the moon was full. just northwest of the moon a bright light bigger and brighter than any star came on. it was about one tenth the size of the moon. i keep and eye on this bright light for 3 or 4 mins. i keep walking then the most crazy thing happen. a small light seam to come out of the bright light. and started going south in a really fast in a back and forth motion. about 30 seconds afterwards the bright light went out and the little light keep going south.  chuck beaudry
content.summary: Saw a bright light a little light came out of the big one, the big light went out and the little kept going south.

content.detailedDescription:
I had two sightings in the city of delaware, ohio. the first sighting was around 5:45 p.M. it caught my eye because i thought i saw a plane in the air but had some unique festive like red, white and green bright lights. the object was estimated to be 50 feet above the tree tops, hovered slowly, with no engine sounds. it would make a complete stop and then continue slowly south east. ok..Festive lights on a airplane is possible but i can not give a good description because it alsmost seemed foggy er transparent but did notice 2 long pole like objects attached to it. the second sighting was at 8:30 p.M.

unfortunately there are no witness that i know of. usually the winter in ohio is windy and cold but it's been warm and calm. that night the sky was clear, calm and with a full moon. i called it festive because the lights had no pattern to distingish. a light that was once red would turn green or white or skip and stay green when it was exsposed to turn red. it was not a normal aircraft light pattern. it did have three main areas that the lights seemed to come from. 

back in the summer of 2001 i had another sighting of a triangle shaped what ever it was crossing over head while i was camping in kirkersville, ohio. i stood there with my jaw dropped until it passed behind the trees. the sad part was that the three other friends i was with went to get more beer while i watched the fire when it happened and i never said anything. this time it just bothered me so much that i had to say something.
content.summary: Red white & green lights

content.detailedDescription:
We were fishing on vancouver island near port mcneill, and we were coming in to get some fuel for the boat at telegraph cove. we were going through a channel where a riptide was present and i wanted to get a picture of it.
later on, after downloading the photo onto my computer, my son noticed something wierd in the upper left section of this particular photo. i couldn't identify it other than that it appeared to be a ufo. i wasn't going to report it as we didn't witness it in real time, but after hearing about this other one at o'hare in chicago, i remembered that i have a picture and decided to send it to you guys. it's not a bad pic, considering that i wasn't focusing on it. i'm sure the photo enhancing software that you guys have would probably be better than what i have. this pic that i have has not been altered or enhanced in any way.

sincerely,
ralf kauth
content.summary: Caught ufo un-aware

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were out on my boat on oneida lake for a late nite of fishing having done this countless times,we launched at approx 11:00pm absolutely clear skies every starin the ski was out a beautiful night to be fishing.When fishing you cant help but look at stars and such. i have seen all kinds of air planes,satalites shooting stars and such on the lake  quiet you can here and see propeller planes in the area of  1-4 miles away no problem.At approx 1:40am this constant orange light  over near larkin point(south shore)slowly moved towards the lake no sound. i thoght it was the local sheriff helicopter at first but once it was over water only 1/2 mile from us there was still no sound and i knew it was not the sheriff helicopter there is other lights  on the bottom of the chopper. this object moved appropx 3 miles in 40 minutes we stared at this object in total curiosity not afraid or anything.The object i can only say was a large light 20-30 feet across the light was constant not a strobe. watching this was more exiting than the fishing(nothing biting) after sitting not catching any thing we decided to call it a nite,the object was in line between us and the boat launch i say to my friend we will go under it on the way in (it now hovering over the lake) we were only 3/4 from the launch.As we headed in this object went in reverse  from a stopped position i was moving slow at first it moved slow as we headed init took it same flight path back inland  we only go as close as 1/4 mile still no sound it went back over land inland 1/2 mile or so. now were approching the boat launch not taking our eyes off it for a split second and it was gone. i have seen many aviation aircraft shows on tv and in person me believing it's got to be aregular air is the first thing in my mind but it clearly was not.
content.summary: Large orange light slowly moving from over land to water approx 500 feet above water

content.detailedDescription:
First off, please note that the month and day of sighting are very approximate, but the time of day was late afternoon; to the best of my recollection, the sun was just setting near the end of the events.
i was in my backyard setting up binoculars for a coming evening of star-gazing and picking up around the yard. looking at the beautiful clear sky, i happened to notice what i recall as three " glowing objects " approaching from just south of east over the neighborhood. as a beginning amateur astronomer, i'd made a habit out of trying to guage sky conditions.
i thought that these objects were either helicopters or some kind of hover -craft, and remember thinking that this sighting could be associated with the
oshkosh air show which i believed to be taking place at the time. these three
objects, however , put on quite a show for me! each of the three objects looked identical . the shape was roughly circular. the size was about the
size of a pencil viewed end-on at about 6" from my eye. the color was an
unvarying , glowing red-orange. the luminosity of the object was very striking.I could best describe the effect as blazing . the colored shape
did not have a distinct border , but rather seemed to emanate with an even
light that nevertheless had a " fuzziness " at it's outer edge . the actions
of the objects were as follows: they approached in an organized looking
group of three covering an area of 20 to 30 degrees in length, north to south, with rather even spacing between them. their altitude was demonstrated
to me when, of all things, a commercial airliner , possibly making an approach to o'hara field , passed over the group of objects! i'm not sure about the timeframe of the next events ( in terms of how long after the
airliner pass they took place), but i do remember the sequence of following
events.The southern most object slowly moved further south while not appearing to gain or lose altitude, until it was no longer visible due to
being blocked by tree lines to the south. the next most northerly object
hovered, and then began to gain altitude without any apparent east to west
motion. it simply seemed to ascend in place until it was no longer visible.
that left the third object, which seemed to pass directly over my backyard
and neighborhood while maintaining a constant, slow speed and altitude.I
was able to view this object with tripod-mounted 10x binoculars arranged
in such a way that i could view straight up while reclining in a lawn chair
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three objects approached from east/south-east/ performed maneuvers/last of the objects passed almost directly overhead as i watched with 10x binoculars.

content.detailedDescription: I neen to speak to some one. please.
content.summary: 5 ships went over my car; they were below radar . they made no sound . called police got canned response .

content.detailedDescription:
My friends and i were out in the woods celebrating another summer when around 1:00 am i noticed there was a large orange circle in the west sky i thought nothing more than harvest moon i was a bit tipsy i brought it to my friends attention just then i noticed a steady moving small white light in the north sky it looked like a star but i suspected it was a ufo my friends and i are free thinkers with open minds and this wasn't the first thing we have seen so me and my friend jumped inside his truck to flash the bright lights at the object to try to get a reaction or "make contact" after a couple of flashes the steady moving star like light became incredibly bright then dissapeared we jumped out of the truck excited at what we had seen when i noticed the large orange light in the west sky had vanished you can imagine my surprise that genuinely scared me i could almost read the pilot's mind "there on to us lets get out of here" i've seen a lot of strange things in my relatively short life but nothing quite like this to this day on a clear night i watch for strange movement in the sky when i told someone close to me about this they responded with if ufo's were real don't you think everyone would see them to this i said noone is looking, i would wager the majority of the u.S. doesn't believe and the rest of the people don't have the time or presence of mind to look at a beautiful night sky.



                                                     sincerely,
                                                     james davis
content.summary: My friends and i were out in the woods when we noticed lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
do i believe in ufos, yes are there aliens? maybe, 
i am a new testament christianand, here are a couple of my experiences.
   
   back in the 80s i was driving my 77 ford pick up home from work one evening. 
it was just starting to get dark and i was driving up a streach road that led close to the top of a hill when something to 

the right caught my eye,there are mostly trees on the right side but in an open space i caught a glimps of a glowing light, 

low and moving the same direction i was going. i thought what the hoot maybe i can get to the top of the hill where the road 

turns left or right and get another look.
 when i came to the top it had already turned left around the top of the hill and was coming parallel to me going in the 

opposite direction, about seventy yards away and maybe sevety five or eighty feet up but listen to this, i stopped, shut my 

motor off and got out as it 
came to about a hundred feet away, it didn't make a noise.....It looked like a bi-plane with the nose cutoff flush with the 

wings and the tail section also cut off at the wings with a full height cab . there wasn't 
enough light to see any outline of any persons 
inside. out near the ends and in between both 
the wings were  large amber colored lights, 
made like two dixie cups with the big ends 
together with the points centered and secured 
in the wings......
   if anone else has seen one please let me know.

another one was nothing but lights, i saw about dark, back about 1963 a light that looked as though a small plane just topping 

over a hill about a hundred or so yards away all i could see was a blinking light. i was standing leaning on my cousins car, he was facing the other way.
    suddenly this small moving light stopped blinking and it looked as though someone was opening a big garauge door and the 

garauge was filled with brilliant light, then after a second or so it looked like the door closed but there was nothing there 

and not a sound..........
content.summary: Ufo like a bi plane with just wings.

content.detailedDescription: I just pulled into my drive way when i noticed several bright lights in the sky, about 10 or 12. i stood there and observed them for about a half hour. while i watched these lights i saw one among the trees moving south "i was looking to the east." i keep looking around and right above me there was a large dark object with four lights in the shape of a diamond, the lights were faint, but noticable. the lights were slowly moving north at a steady pace. the clouds were starting to move in about this time. most of the lights by now were covered by the clouds. i could only see the one light in the tree line, it started pulsing a clear light then the light pattern instantly changed to a multi color strobing pattern. the light moved fairly quickly upward into the clouds and disappeared. that was the last that i saw of the lights.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Moving lights in the sky, looked like really bright flashing stars

content.detailedDescription:
I'm sitting in my bedroom looking out the west window, it is around 5pm to 5:30 and lasted about 20 minutes. i saw this very bright light and i thought that's pretty bright for a star and low too! theres a bright moon out too on the other side of the house and a clear night. i opened my window and started taking pictures with my fuji digital camera,and a movie with it too but it dident turn out so will i moved around to much. the object moved so slow you could hardly notice it moving, i watched till i could not see it any more for it was going down ward past the trees. then i took pics of stars and planes that pass over my house to compare it to the object.
but you could hardly see them in the pics even if i lighten the pic up.
i can't say how far off this very bright light was. when you zoom up the pic
you could say it might be a satelite. what do you think? i don't think i can get that good of a pic of a satelite!!! zoom it up and tell me your the export!    i decided to add the video clip but it needs to be lighten up, the colored lights at the bottom of the video are just cars passing by my fence. and like i said i was moving around too much.
content.summary: Very big bright light

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to let my dog go to the bathroom and looked up into the sky for no real reason.  i only noticed the object/objects because i'm a retired air force flyer and always look up to see any air traffic in the area.  i can tell by the traffic if there's been a wind change at the airport requiring airplanes to use a different approach to the field.  there was no wind. 

the object looked like two pale amber lights that appeared to be subdued by some sort of haze or fog.  but the sky was absolutely clear in every direction.  there was no street noise where i was standing but the object was completely silent.  it appeared to be only about 150 yards from me at the most.  it also appeared to be no higher than 500 feet agl, which would be an faa violation for any aircraft in this area.  if the craft was further away from me or higher than i thought then it was moving at an even more incredible speed and was much larger.  either the two lights were on the same craft or they were in perfect formation.  and they were exactly the same size.  they did not blink.

the object was moving towards the southeast at an extreme rate of speed.  i should've been able to hear something at that range if it were a normal aircraft.  as it passed my position it faded rapidly as if becoming somehow invisible.

my reaction to seeing this was a complete loss of situational awareness.  i had no idea what my dog was doing and just kept staring up even after this thing had disappeared, holding on to her leash.  i must've stared up at nothing for a full 5 minutes, which is pretty long just to stare at nothing.

when i returned to my apartment my hands were shaking and my palms were sweating.  that thing just shouldn't have been there, and shouldn't have displayed those flight characteristics.  i guess it was shaking my reality a little bit.  it almost looked like it was semi-transparent, or enveloped in a fog or haze that moved with it.  i almost hate to make this reference, but the way it disappeared looked exactly the way a romulan ship looks when it's cloaking itself on star trek.  i should have been able to continue to observe this thing as it flew away, but it just faded out. it didn't just wink out...It faded out.
content.summary: Two fast-moving, silent, low amber lights heading southeast over pittsfield.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to have a cigarette.  i looked over a nearby hill and saw it hovering while moving slowly.I watched it for as long as it had lasted then it disappeared.
content.summary: Pure silver, moving slowly, no sound

content.detailedDescription:
Leaving a drive-thru restaurant and headed east on dodge street in omaha, nebraska. it was still quite light and no clouds in the sky, aperfect blue. i noticed the a large loosely organized flock of blackbirds flying about particulary slowly, thinking it strange. the traffic was slowing for a stop light so i sat watching the birds looking northeast and then north, and that's when i saw the object.
i watch the skies frequently and this object caught my attention. this is a regular path for the airport (perhaps eight miles to the ne of where i was stopped in traffic), but what i was watching didn't seem to be flying like a plane, as you would normally see.
the sun was quite low on the horizon, so the light was good. i rolled down my car window, so i could see without distortion. i just sat there and watched as the object traveled slowly --- not ascending, or dropping. it just seemed to cruising slowly, at an even height. no exhaust. no blinking lights. no apparent wings or tail fins. there did seem to be a darker marking at the east end -- but it wasn't protruding like a plane tail would.
the object was high enough that one needed to raise their eyes above the horizon, but low enough not to crane your neck and raise your head to see it. it was low enough that you couldn't see under it --- just the side of the object. for those familiar with omaha, it was on a course -- perhaps in a line following blondo street straight west (again, i was watching from 43rd and dodge).
i wanted to pull off the road and watch it longer, but traffic and my location wouldn't allow.
rushing up to my apartment, i let my food get cold as i called the number on the omaha mufon sight, which happened to be a number in colorado. i spoke with james and he suggested i fill out this form.
hope others saw it. the first thing that came to james' mind was a blimp, but it didn't look that fat. 
i was quite excited after seeing the object and wanted to yell to others stopped at the light to look, but it was chilly and everyone had their windows rolled up. the first thing that came to my mind, was rush home and report the sighting. after traffic started moving i continued east, the object continued west. i lost sight of it because of the trees in my neighborhood blocked the view when i was able to stop again.
content.summary: Steady, but slow moving cigar/cylinder shaped object. silver-white in color. no lights. no windows. no apparent wings. no exhuast.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were driving to greeley on i-76 and pulled over near the weigh station, around mile marker 77, after she noticed the object in the sky. we watched until it faded, or, as i think of it, blended in with the sky. the object flew slower than a jetliner, was very long and seemed to be in rectangular sections that were stepped or tiered. there were several lights on the object. some were bright, as at the nose and amidship about 3/4 of the way back, and some were dull, but they appeared to be individual lights. i remember one being blue, and it had one bright white blinking light. no red lights were present. it seemed to me that the lights reflected a highly polished chrome-like surface that was difficult to make out because it seemed to take on or highly reflect the color of the dark sky. the lights on the body made the object stand out and suggested its shape of being tiered rectangular sections. it flew north to south. it appeared to my field of vision underneath the nearly- full moon. it wasn't that far off the ground. i'd guess 5-10,000 feet, about the altitude of a small plane. we watched until it faded. we should have been able to see it for a longer period, but it faded tail first, and the last we saw were the bright lights on its nose.

the object was definitely not some kind of meteorite broken apart as the pieces would have been flying apart and burning. this was not burning. all of the lights were at uniform distance relative to one another and moved at uniform speed. i immediately believed the object to be some kind of ship. it was definitely a manufactured object. my wife says that it appeared to emit a vaporous trail behind it, but i didn't see that.

unfortunately, we did not have a camera. however, numerous others saw the object as well we later found out from a friend who was listening to the radio.
content.summary: Sectioned and tiered, several lights, long, slow, maybe 5-10,000 ft. alt. faded or "blended into the sky"
